text: Harris Musa Dzarma (born 1952) is a retired Nigerian Army Major General who served as the 23rd Commandant of the Nigerian Defence Academy from 2006 to 2008. He enrolled at the Nigerian Defence Academy in 1973 as a member of the 14 Regular Combatant Course where he was coursemates with Lt-Gen Luka Yusuf and ACM Paul Dike. He was replaced as Commandant in August 2008. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian Army officers Category:Nigerian Defence Academy Commandants Category:Nigerian generals Category:Nigerian Defence Academy alumni
title: Harris Dzarma
